name: Black silk girl
description:
It's a casual whack-a-mole like game with lots of pictures of girls, and when the block turns red, click on it. You can remove it, remove all the squares, you can see the girl's face.

♦ There were 18 girls, all very beautiful.
♦ There will be a girl's voice in the game, which is very attractive.
♦ Good background music accompanies the whole game.
♦ Conscience price, you can see 18 girls.
